oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Antimicrobial effect of 4 formulations from 8 plants after storage for > 1 year at -18째C
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hansen, Flemming
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Food security, food quality and human health
Processing, packaging and transportation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This report documents the storage stability at -18째C for more than 1 year for 4 different formulations made from 8 selected plants. The formulations are: "raw, blended"; "blended and pasteurised at 92째C"; "freeze-dried powder" and "oven-dried powder". The antimcrobial effect was tested in a broth based lab test system using 3 different bacteria (salmonella, E. coli and L. monocytogenes). In general the antimicrobial effect was preserved for more than one year (up to 1,5 year) for all formulations.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Hansen, Flemming (2014) Antimicrobial effect of 4 formulations from 8 plants after storage for > 1 year at -18째C. Danish Meat Research Institute.
